div1.p: Stephen F. Austin's certificate of attendance at Transylvania University.

It is hereby certified—that the bearer Stephen F. Austin has been a student—two sessions & an half—of the Transylvania University— during which time he studied various branches of the Mathematics— Geography—Astronomy—Natural & Moral Philosophy—read some History & conducted himself in an exemplary & praiseworthy manner
